name: Nako's Nacho's [Demo 3]
description:
Nako's Nachos is a fast paced platformer inspired by Pizza Tower. This game features the cutest little guy Nako! This game has been in development for over a month and is still in development. Things could change at any point. If you have any suggestions, please give me any. Thank you.

Nako: Literally The Best Booger

CREDITS: 

Main Dev:@SrGoober

Thanks to my homie dog friend Crumbs for coming up with Ideas. 

Like the game? Consider Joining our Discord Server!
